name: HackaVirus
description:
So the game idea is that you have to hack the system by doing simple math and fill the missing parts to prevent the AntiVirus from killing the virus you send ! so it is a drag and drom based game . Thank you for playing! 

PS: there will be a video about the making of this game in a few days ! 

This is the Channel link : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXedv-ePPfYAVdBnGIhYczQ
